byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: 1st 2-C patrol-bomber flying boat for Canada anchors on Manhasset Bay after 1-stop flight from San Diego
snippet: PORT WASHINGTON, L.I., Nov. 30--The first Consolidated-2C patrol-bomber type flying boat, to be delivered to Great Britain, lay at anchor in Manhasset Bay tonight, under a strong guard of Nassau County police, crew members and private guards....

headline.main: NEW FLYING BOAT FOR CANADA HERE; Bomber Alights in Sound After Fast Trip From Coast

lead_paragraph: PORT WASHINGTON, L.I., Nov. 30--The first Consolidated-2C patrol-bomber type flying boat, to be delivered to Great Britain, lay at anchor in Manhasset Bay tonight, under a strong guard of Nassau County police, crew members and private guards.
